message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,000. It's a great deal, and I'm confident it will be worth every penny to you. Let me know what you think.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the opportunity to purchase your product. However, I am only able to offer $9,500 for the item. I hope this proposal works for you.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm not quite ready to go that low. I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $10,250? This still leaves some room for both of us to walk away with a good deal.
Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I appreciate your flexibility. I would like to counter with $10,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price for both of us.
